title: A proclamation agreed vpon by the iustices of peace of this countie of Bedford at a generall sessions holden at Bedford, the nineteenth day of Aprill, in the xxvii yere of the Queenes most gracious raigne, for the restraint of wandering roges and vacabounds
author: Bedfordshire (England)
notes: Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
